actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A resolution to express disapproval of the Senate to the plan for the use and distribution of the Grand River Band of Ottawa Indians judgment funds awarded in Docket Numbered 40-K by the Indian Claims Commission.

summary.text: Expresses disapproval of the plan of the Indian Claims Commission in the case of the Grand River Band of Ottawa Indians.

titles.title: A resolution to express disapproval of the Senate to the plan for the use and distribution of the Grand River Band of Ottawa Indians judgment funds awarded in Docket Numbered 40-K by the Indian Claims Commission.
